tweet_text: India sent 100,000 doses of COVID-19 vaccines to Barbados. This is a significant and meaningful gesture. the people of Barbados are grateful to the Prime Minister of India , Mr. Modi , for his prompt and generous decision to send these vaccines.

Being a part of @ETHPnews we. we announce that we have established two # COVID19 Immunization Clinics in # EastToronto . This week , these clinics will provide vaccines to eligible priority groups , such as health care workers and individuals over 80 years old. For more information please visit https://t.co/t890KePvBG https://t.co/We2EdhFitS..
